revision.text:
__NOTOC__clearscope int '''GetAge''' () const
==Usage== Retrieves the number of [[tic]]s that have passed since the calling actor was spawned.
===Return value=== The age in tics as an integer.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
==See also== *[[GetLevelSpawnTime]]
[[Category:DECORATE]] [[Category:ZScript]]
